title: Store is now a Generic class
description: As of Home Assistant Core 2022.8, a Store (from homeassistant/helpers/storage.py) is defined as a Generic Store(Generic[_T]). It is recommended that the type of data being stored be defined in the Store definition. It should be JSON-serialisable (dict or list), for example:

frontMatter.author: epenet
frontMatter.title: Store is now a Generic class
